Package org.neo4j.kernel.recovery

Class CorruptedLogsTruncator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.neo4j.kernel.recovery.CorruptedLogsTruncator
  • public class CorruptedLogsTruncator
extends Object
    Transaction log truncator used during recovery to truncate all the logs after some specified position, that recovery treats as corrupted or non-readable. Transaction log file specified by provided log position will be truncated to provided length, any subsequent files will be removed. Any removed or modified log content will be stored in separate corruption logs archive for further analysis and as an additional safety option to have the possibility to fully restore original logs in a faulty case.

    • Method Detail

      • truncate

        public void truncate​(LogPosition positionAfterLastRecoveredTransaction)
              throws IOException
        Truncate all transaction logs after provided position. Log version specified in a position will be truncated to provided byte offset, any subsequent log files will be deleted. Any checkpoints pointing ahead of the position will be removed. Backup copy of removed data will be stored in separate archive.
        Parameters:
        positionAfterLastRecoveredTransaction - position after last recovered transaction
        Throws:
        IOException
